China: Li Shizhen published the Compendium of Materia Medica.
Japan: Toyotomi Hideyoshi has launched the Kyūshū Campaign.
Philippine: Arrival of Miguel de Benavides with the second batch of Dominicans in the Philippines, and the establishment of the Province of the Most Holy Rosary of the Philippines
Poland:
Election of Sigismund III Vasa
Coronation of Sigismund III Waza
